name: Lorem_sentenceTest
description: Unit tests for the Lorem sentence generation functionality.

test_cases.name: testSentenceWithFixedWordCount
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a sentence with a fixed word count.

test_cases.name: testSentenceWithRandomWordsAdded
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a sentence with a fixed base word count and additional random words.

test_cases.name: testSentenceWithZeroWordCount
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a sentence with zero word count.

test_cases.name: testSentenceWithNegativeWordCount
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a sentence with a negative word count.

test_cases.name: testSentenceWithRandomWordsAddedAndZeroBase
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a sentence with zero base word count and additional random words.
